executable.title: Tables
executable.description: The Tables module allows displaying and editing of spreadsheets.

parameter.label: Active table
parameter.description: Select the table node to edit/view.

parameter.label: Lock button
parameter.description: Allows locking the table node to read-only. Only applies to the user interface. The node can eb still modified programmatically.

parameter.label: Copy button
parameter.description: Copy contents of selected cells to clipboard.

parameter.label: Paste button
parameter.description: Paste contents of clipboard at the current position. Data that does not fit into the table is ignored.

parameter.label: Add column button
parameter.description: Add an empty column at the end of the table.

parameter.label: Delete column button
parameter.description: Delete all selected columns. If any cell is selected in a column the entire column will be removed.

parameter.label: Lock first column button
parameter.description: Use the first column as row header. Header cannot be edited and is not copied to clipboard but still saved to file.

parameter.label: Add row button
parameter.description: Add an empty row at the end of the table.

parameter.label: Delete row button
parameter.description: Delete all selected rows. If any cell is selected in a row the entire row will be removed.

parameter.label: Lock first row button
parameter.description: Use the first row as column header. Header cannot be edited and is not copied to clipboard but still saved to file.
